name: Our Craft
description:
Tell the truth, to find such a game, only the old driver can do!!!
The new 3D sandbox Mobile Games arrived in front of you be caught off guard. Freedom, comfort, creation, is the theme of the game. There is no enemy, no smoke, no mission, there is just a free running, flying, creation, destruction of the world. Now, you are playing the game, not the game.
Game features:
1 seamless unlimited map. You can be in our world of infinite run, until your mobile phone scrapped you also do not go to the end.
2 all unlock the box. Now you can use any square to create buildings, because they can be used by default.
3 human manipulation experience. Whether it is moving, jumping, building a building, or destroying bricks, or crossing obstacles, are all so handy.
4 first person 3D vision. Personally on the scene, too wonderful for words.
If you want to create your own city, then download it! I swear, if you are not satisfied with my live network to eat shit.
